ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(NOT($Permission.Exclude_from_Validation) && RecordType.DeveloperName = 'FP_Account' && NOT ISBLANK(TEXT(No_paper_bag_reason__c)) && NOT INCLUDES( Exclude_from__c, 'Automatic paper bag supply'), true, false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The field "No paper bag reason" can only have a value if the vendor is excluded from "Automatic paper bag supply". Please deselect the reason.
